title: Bekić's theorem
summary: In computability theory, Bekić's theorem or Bekić's lemma is a theorem about fixed-points which allows splitting a mutual recursion into recursions on one variable at a time.[1][2][3] It was created by Austrian Hans Bekić (1936-1982) in 1969,[4] and published posthumously in a book by Cliff Jones in 1984.[5]
